TransactionStateContext.DepositState: When users deposit Ether and the Deposit function is called, adding Ether to the Holders mapping if the amount is above MinDeposit.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawalState: When users withdraw tokens or Ether, managed through WitdrawTokenToHolder and WithdrawToHolder functions with specific checks for Holder balances and permissions.

ExternalInteractions.TokenTransfers: Transfers tokens between users and the contract address using token.call() for token transfers and _addr.call.value() for Ether withdrawals.
